{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.1K in 2021-2022** on contracts with IBI GROUP ARCHITECTS CANADA.

Across 12 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 5 have at least one amendment (42%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 119% and the average number of amendments was 3. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$7.2M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 2.06 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$1.8M. The longest contract was 8.15 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$13.5M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
